name: Easy Focaccia Bread
author: SARAH HARDIMON
summary: A quick and easy recipe for making focaccia bread. Begin with a loaf of thawed frozen bread dough. Knead in seasoning and brush with olive oil. Top with seasoned tomato paste and Parmesan cheese.
ingredients: 1 (1 pound) loaf frozen bread dough, thawed
directions: Preheat oven to 375  degrees F (190 degrees C)
Lightly grease a medium baking sheet
In a bowl, blend the tomato paste, honey, and basil
Knead the Italian seasoning into the frozen bread dough, and roll into a 12-inch circle on the prepared baking sheet
With a fork, poke holes in the surface of the dough
Brush with the tomato paste mixture
Bake 30 minutes in the preheated oven, until the bread is lightly browned
